description: Primes of the form p + (smallest prime >= p+1) + (smallest prime >= p+3).
comments: Originally an erroneous version of A034962.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) psumpr3(n) = { c1=0; c2=0; forprime(x=3, n, s = nextprime(x)+nextprime(x+1)+nextprime(x+3); c1++; if(isprime(s), c2++; print1(s" ")); ); print(); print(c2/c1+.0) }
author: _Cino Hilliard_, May 08 2003
